p: The results of the invariance test of the ECC model showed that most of the indicators fit the suggested values from Vandenberg et al. [ 60] and Little [ 61], except that the value of the Î”CFI of the measurement residual was 0.025 (>0.01). Based on the suggestions of Marsh et al. [ 61] and Byrne et al. [ 62], this study concluded that the ECC model could be measured across gender groups with invariance.
